Install Kvm With Gui On Ubuntu 12.04

13 August 2013

Install KVM:

sudo apt-get install qemu-kvm libvirt-bin ubuntu-vm-builder bridge-utils

Install the graphical interface:

sudo apt-get install virt-manager
